    <TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; padding-top: 1pt; padding-bottom: 1pt; padding-left: 2pt; vertical-align: bottom; border-bottom: black 1px solid; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; border-right: Black 1px solid"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 9pt"><B>(4)
    Date Filed:</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

    <DIV STYLE="margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Silver 4px solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 10pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: left; width: 100%"><PAGE></PAGE></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: right"><IMG SRC="companylogo.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 30pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<DIV align="left">
<DIV STYLE="width: 837px; height: 134px">

<P STYLE="font: 30pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left"><IMG SRC="lapax1x2.jpg" ALT=""></P>

<P STYLE="font: 29pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: -85pt 0 0pt 270pt; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="color: White"><B>Message
from Our<br>Lead Director</B></FONT></P>
</div>
</div>



<P STYLE="font: 30pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0 0 0pt; text-align: left">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">Dear Fellow Shareholders,</P>


<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">With this proxy statement, Apache
celebrates 60 years of surviving and thriving in an industry known for unforgiving and unpredictable cycles. When we periodically
underperform, as we have recently, we take the kinds of important strategic steps you have seen from us recently. It is steps like
these that have helped us enjoy above-market returns over our history.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">Our Board&rsquo;s mission is to
represent your interests by responsibly producing sustainable value over the long haul. We are committed to listening as well as
speaking and believe our engagement track record is second to none. Except for our current and former CEOs, we are all independent.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">Purpose-built governance has always
been our foundation. We avoid governance fashions, but evolve as conditions change. Good governance cannot prevent short-term stumbles,
but it contributes to long-term sustainable performance.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">As your Lead Director, I want to
highlight a few of our board-focused governance features from the much longer list contained in this proxy statement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">Our robust board refreshment practices
are apparent in our board composition. We have seven short-tenured directors in their 40s and 50s, and, by the time of our annual
meeting, will have experienced the retirement of six longer-tenured directors over the last three years. We believe in the benefits of diversity, including diversity of tenure.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">We award the majority of our director
pay in company stock and require it to be held until retirement.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">Finally, as of the annual meeting
for which you are receiving this proxy statement, we will have an independent non-executive Chairman. Our newly appointed CEO is
a long-time employee who reflects the best of succession planning.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 36pt 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">We take seriously the trust you
place in us by your purchase of Apache shares and hope the material contained in this proxy statement demonstrates that. We ask
that you vote in accord with our recommendations as a signal of support for our continuing efforts.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">Sincerely,</P>

<P STYLE="font: 3pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: left; padding-left: 72pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt"><IMG SRC="lapax1x3.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt"><B>Charles J. Pitman</B>&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt"><I>Lead Director</I>&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; padding-left: 72pt">April 2, 2015&nbsp;</P>



    <DIV STYLE="margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Silver 4px solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 10pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: bold 8pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 100%"><PAGE></PAGE></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>

on your behalf and per your instructions. This action does not limit your right to vote in person or to attend the meeting.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 22pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; color: rgb(199,153,0)">PROXY STATEMENT SUMMARY</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><I>This executive summary has been provided as an overview
of the information contained within this proxy statement. We encourage you to read the entire proxy statement prior to voting.</I></P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid">2014 Business
Highlights</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 99%; font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 10pt"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Continued
                                         transition to becoming a premier North American onshore resource E&amp;P company through
                                         strategic divestment of material non-core assets, driving down costs, drilling more productive
                                         wells, and continuing to mature several resource plays</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">To facilitate this transition,
                                         divested or announced sale of approximately $7 billion of non-core assets</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Repurchased 21.0 million
                                         shares, reducing our share count by 5.3 percent</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Liquids production
                                         for the year averaged 387 Mboe/d, with crude oil representing 83 percent of total liquids
                                         production</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">North American onshore
                                         liquids production increased 17 percent, averaging 209 Mboe/d in 2014 compared to 179
                                         Mboe/d in 2013</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid">Corporate Governance
Highlights</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 99%; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="width: 10pt; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Separate
                                         chairman and CEO effective January 20, 2015</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Independent non-executive
                                         chairman effective May 2, 2015</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Independent lead director</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Majority voting</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">No poison pill</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Right to call a special
                                         meeting at 15 percent</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Officer and director
                                         stock ownership requirements, including pay multiples and hold-until-retirement provisions</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Mandatory director
                                         retirement age for directors elected after 2013</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Policies against hedging,
                                         pledging, and gross ups</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Clawbacks of equity
                                         awards as required by law</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Double triggers for
                                         accelerated vesting of equity upon a change in control</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Board adopted human
                                         rights principles and statement on indigenous peoples</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">Robust board review
                                         and board refreshment practices</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">State of the art shareholder
                                         engagement practices</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid">Board Nominees (<a href="#pg10">pg. 10</A>)</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

Each director will be elected for a term of three years.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid">2014 Director
and Executive Compensation Actions</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)"><I>Director
Compensation</I></FONT><I> (<a href="#pg22">pg. 22</A>)</I></P>

<P STYLE="font: 3pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; width: 99%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="width: 10pt; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Reduced the cash portion of the annual retainer for our outside directors from $150,000
to $100,000; and</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Increased the equity portion of the annual retainer for our outside directors from
$150,000 to $200,000 with requirement that such stock be held until the director leaves the board</TD>
</TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)"><I>Named
Executive Officer Compensation</I></FONT><I> (<a href="#pg29">pg. 29</A>)</I></P>

<P STYLE="font: 3pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; width: 99%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="width: 10pt; text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Introduced a new performance share program for 2014 based on business performance
results;</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Increased the proportion of our equity awards that are performance-based to two-thirds
for the CEO and one-half for all other Named Executive Officers (&ldquo;NEOs&rdquo;); and</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Redesigned the annual cash incentive bonus program to better align with corporate
strategy</TD>
</TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: right"><B>APACHE CORPORATION</B> <I>- 2015 Proxy
Statement</I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>3</B>&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid">2015 Leadership
Succession Highlights</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 99%; font: 10pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 10pt; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 9pt">G. Steven Farris retired as president and CEO effective January 20,
2015, after serving the Company for over 27 years. Mr. Farris continues to serve as non-executive chairman through May 1, 2015.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 9pt">John J. Christmann, IV was appointed president and CEO effective January
20, 2015.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 9pt">John E. Lowe was elected independent non-executive chairman effective
May 2, 2015.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="font: 3pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 9pt">Stephen J. Riney was appointed executive vice president effective
February 18, 2015, and chief financial officer effective March 3, 2015.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid">Ratification
of Auditors (<a href="#pg51">pg. 51</a>)</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Although shareholder ratification
is not required, the appointment of Ernst &amp; Young LLP as the Company&rsquo;s independent auditors for fiscal 2015 is being
submitted for ratification at the annual meeting because the Board believes doing so is a good corporate governance practice.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid">Eliminate the
Classified Board Proposal (<a href="#pg55">pg. 55</a>)</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">The board recommends a vote &ldquo;<B>FOR</B>&rdquo;
the proposed amendment to the Company&rsquo;s restated certificate of incorporation to eliminate the classified board of directors
and provide for the annual election of all directors.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid">Proxy Access
Proposal (<a href="#pg56">pg. 56</A>)</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">The Board recommends a vote &ldquo;<B>FOR</B>&rdquo;
the shareholder proposal regarding proxy access.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt/normal Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: right"><B>APACHE CORPORATION</B> <I>- 2015 Proxy
Statement</I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>4</B>&nbsp;</P>

    <TD STYLE="text-align: right; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; vertical-align: bottom">&nbsp;</TD></TR>

    <TD STYLE="font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; border-bottom: rgb(64,64,64) 2px solid"><A  HREF="#lapaa037"><FONT STYLE="color: rgb(199,153,0)"><B>ADVISORY VOTE
    TO APPROVE COMPENSATION OF NAMED EXECUTIVE OFFICERS (ITEM NO. 6)</B></FONT></A></TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: right; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; border-bottom: rgb(64,64,64) 2px solid; vertical-align: bottom"><A style="color:black" HREF="#lapaa037"><B>53</B></A></TD></TR>

    <TD STYLE="text-align: right; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; border-bottom: rgb(64,64,64) 2px solid; vertical-align: bottom"><A style="color:black" HREF="#lapaa038"><B>55</B></A></TD></TR>

herein is not incorporated by reference into, and does not constitute a part of, this proxy statement.</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: right"><B>APACHE CORPORATION</B> <I>- 2015
Proxy Statement</I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>6</B></P>


    <DIV STYLE="margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Silver 4px solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 10pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: bold 8pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: left; width: 50%"><A HREF="#toc">Back to Contents</A></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: right; width: 50%"><PAGE></PAGE></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>



<P STYLE="font: 22pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; color: rgb(199,153,0)"><A NAME="pg7"></A><A NAME="lapaa001"></A>PROXY STATEMENT</P>

<P STYLE="font: 20pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 18pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B><A NAME="lapaa002"></A>General</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">This proxy statement contains information
about the 2015 annual meeting of shareholders of Apache Corporation. In this proxy statement both &ldquo;Apache&rdquo; and the
&ldquo;Company&rdquo; refer to Apache Corporation. This proxy statement and the enclosed proxy card are being mailed to you by
the Company&rsquo;s Board of Directors starting on or about April 2, 2015.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid"><B><A NAME="lapaa003"></A>Purpose of the Annual Meeting</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">At the Company&rsquo;s annual meeting, shareholders will
vote on the following matters:</P>



<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; width: 99%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="width: 10pt; text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Items 1- 4: election of directors;</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Item 5: ratification of appointment of Ernst &amp; Young LLP as the Company&rsquo;s
independent auditors;</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Item 6: advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Company&rsquo;s named executive
officers;</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Item 7: approval of an amendment to the Company&rsquo;s Restated Certificate of Incorporation
to eliminate the classified Board of Directors and provide for annual election of all directors;</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Item 8: consideration of shareholder proposal regarding proxy access, if properly
presented at the meeting; and</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Transaction of any other business that properly comes before the meeting. As of the
date of this proxy statement, the Company is not aware of any other business to come before the meeting.</TD>
</TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">There are no rights of appraisal or similar rights of
dissenters arising from matters to be acted on at the meeting.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid"><B><A NAME="lapaa004"></A>Who Can
Vote</B></P>



<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Only shareholders of record holding
shares of Apache common stock at the close of business on the record date, March 16, 2015, are entitled to receive notice of the
annual meeting and to vote the shares of Apache common stock they held on that date. The Company&rsquo;s stock transfer books
will not be closed. A complete list of shareholders entitled to vote at the annual meeting will be available for examination by
any Apache shareholder at 2000 Post Oak Boulevard, Suite 100, Houston, Texas 77056-4400, for purposes relating to the annual meeting,
during normal business hours for a period of ten days before the meeting.</P>


<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">As of February 28, 2015, there were
376,855,800 shares of Apache common stock issued and outstanding. Holders of Apache common stock are entitled to one vote per
share and are not allowed to cumulate votes in the election of directors. The enclosed proxy card shows the number of shares that
you are entitled to vote.</P>


<P STYLE="font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 14pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; border-bottom: rgb(199,153,0) 2px solid"><B><A NAME="lapaa005"></A>How to Vote</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">If your shares of Apache common
stock are held by a broker, bank or other nominee (in &ldquo;street name&rdquo;), you will receive instructions from them on how
to vote your shares. If your shares are held by a broker and you do not give the broker specific instructions on how to vote your
shares, your broker may vote your shares at its discretion on &ldquo;routine&rdquo; matters to be acted upon at the annual meeting.
However, your shares will not be voted on any of the &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters described below. An absence of voting instructions
on any &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters will result in a &ldquo;broker non-vote.&rdquo;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">The only &ldquo;routine&rdquo; matter
to be acted upon at the annual meeting is Item 5 - ratification of appointment of Ernst &amp; Young LLP as the Company&rsquo;s
independent auditors. All other matters to be acted upon at the annual meeting are &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters and, as such,
if you hold all or any portion of your shares in street name and you do not give your broker or bank specific instructions on
how to vote your shares, your shares will not be voted on any of the following &ldquo;non-routine&rdquo; matters:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; width: 99%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="width: 10pt; text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Items 1-4 &ndash; the election of directors;</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Item 6 &ndash; advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Company&rsquo;s named
executive officers;</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Item 7 &ndash; approval of an amendment to the Company&rsquo;s Restated Certificate
of Incorporation to eliminate the classified Board of Directors and provide for annual election of all directors;</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Item 8 &ndash; consideration of shareholder proposal regarding proxy access, if properly
presented to the meeting.</TD>
</TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: right"><B>APACHE CORPORATION</B> <I>- 2015 Proxy
Statement</I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>7</B></P>



    <DIV STYLE="margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Silver 4px solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 12pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 10pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: bold 8pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: left; width: 50%"><A HREF="#toc">Back to Contents</A></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: right; width: 50%"><PAGE></PAGE></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>




<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><A NAME="pg8"></A>If you hold shares of Apache common
stock in your own name (as a &ldquo;shareholder of record&rdquo;), you may instruct the Company on how to vote your shares by:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 99%; border-collapse: collapse">
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
    <TD STYLE="width: 18pt; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; color: rgb(199,153,0)">(1)</TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: justify">using the internet voting site listed
    on the enclosed proxy card or scanning the QR code on the enclosed proxy card with your mobile device (specific directions
    for using the internet/mobile voting system are shown on the proxy card); or</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
    <TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; color: rgb(199,153,0)">(2)</TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">using the toll-free telephone number listed
    on the enclosed proxy card (specific directions for using the telephone voting system are included on the proxy card); or</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
<TD STYLE="text-align: left; color: rgb(199,153,0); font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
    <TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; color: rgb(199,153,0)">(3)</TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">marking, signing, dating, and returning the
    enclosed proxy card in the postage-paid envelope provided.</TD></TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">When using internet/mobile or telephone
voting, the voting systems will verify that you are a shareholder through the use of a company number for Apache and a unique
control number for you. <B><I>If you vote by internet/mobile or telephone, please do not also mail the enclosed proxy card.</I></B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Whichever method you use to transmit
your instructions, your shares of Apache common stock will be voted as you direct. If you sign and return the enclosed proxy card
or otherwise designate the proxies named on the proxy card to vote on your behalf, but do not specify how to vote your shares,
they will be voted:</P>

<P STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; width: 99%">
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
    <TD STYLE="width: 10pt; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD>
    <TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: justify"><B><U>FOR</U></B> the election of the
    nominees for director,</TD></TR>

    <TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B><U>FOR</U></B> the ratification of appointment
    of Ernst &amp; Young LLP as the Company&rsquo;s independent auditors,</TD></TR>

    election of all directors,</TD></TR>

    <TD STYLE="font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; color: rgb(199,153,0)">&bull;</TD>
    <TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 9pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><B><U>FOR</U></B> consideration of shareholder proposal
    regarding proxy access, if properly presented to the meeting, and</TD></TR>
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; font-size: 3pt">
